fullplot: The women of a remote Latin American town are forced to pick up the pieces and remake their world when all the town's men are forcibly recruited by communist guerrillas.
plot: The women of a remote Latin American town are forced to pick up the pieces and remake their world when all the town's men are forcibly recruited by communist guerrillas.
title: Without Men
writers: Gabriela Tagliavini (written for the screen by)
James Canon (based on the novel "Tales from the Town of Widows" by)
